short_description_localized.en: Spacious and inviting, Superior Rooms, located on the 26th to 29th floor, feature oversized windows that frame the vibrant, glittering cityscape.
short_description_localized.es: Spacious and inviting, Superior Rooms, located on the 26th to 29th floor, feature oversized windows that frame the vibrant, glittering cityscape.

description_localized.en: Spacious and inviting, Superior Rooms, located on the 26th to 29th floor, feature oversized windows that frame the vibrant, glittering cityscape. Recharge in an elegant surrounding, with buff-toned wall coverings, handcrafted furniture pieces and a marble-topped bar area. Savour views of iconic structures like the Chrysler, Empire State, Lipstick and Dakota buildings through extra-large windows. When you’re ready to relax, close the drapes with a touch of a button at your bedside.

images.description: The blue accents and rich red wood will make you feel rich and luxuriant.

images.description: Seating for you, seating for your friends and the seating for your Dr. Evil hairless cat.
